TextJPN: 福児庶エ２－３第４４号
TextENG: Children with special needs, general, E2-3 Number 44

TextJPN: 昭和５２年３月１７日
TextENG: March 17th 1977

TextJPN: 児童名：　北条沙都子
TextENG: Child name: Satoko Houjou

TextJPN: 鹿骨市雛見沢村在住
TextENG: Residence: ___ Hinamizawa Village, Shishibone

TextJPN: （１）相談の経路
TextENG: (1) Consultation circumstances

TextJPN: 本児より鹿骨市興宮の生活相談所に電話相談有り。
TextENG: Telephone SOS from child of child abuse.

TextJPN: （２）状況
TextENG: (2) Abuse situation

TextJPN: 本児より、養父との生活に問題をきたしているという訴え。
TextENG: Child claims she is being physically abused by her adoptive father.

TextJPN: （３）家族構成
TextENG: (3) Family structure

TextJPN: 養父、実母、兄、本児
TextENG: Adoptive father, real mother, older brother, child in question

TextJPN: ※養父と実母は昭和５１年に入籍。
TextENG: Note: Adoptive father and real mother entered family registry in 1976.

TextJPN: 本児は離婚した前夫との子。
TextENG: The child is the daughter of the mother's previous husband.

TextJPN: （４）興宮生活相談所の対応
TextENG: (4) Child consultation center's response

TextJPN: 本児より電話相談が入り、同日、学校に電話で、本児の状況を聞き取り。
TextENG: On the day of the child's telephone consultation, the center called the child's school and asked of her situation.

TextJPN: 即日、担当職員が本児宅を訪問し、面談を行なった。
TextENG: On that day, the child welfare officer on duty visited the child's house and conducted an interview.

TextJPN: 養父は真摯に指導を受け入れ、以後、生活相談所主催の講習会を受講することに同意した。
TextENG: The adoptive father sincerely listened to instruction and agreed to take child-raising workshops in the city from now on.

TextJPN: 助言指導とし、経過を観察することとする。
TextENG: As part of the suggested coaching, the center will continue to observe the situation.

TextJPN: （５）その他
TextENG: (5) Other notes

TextJPN: 鹿骨市教育相談所で本児に対し数度のカウンセリングの結果、本児の養父への過度の不信、コミュニケーション不足が原因である可能性が高いことがわかった。
TextENG: As a result of numerous counseling sessions at the city's education consultation office regarding the child, we learned there was a high possibility the cause of the child's excessive distrust towards her adoptive father was the result of a lack of communication.

TextJPN: 当初訴えのあったような問題は実際には発生しておらず、本児が養父を遠ざけるため、虚偽の訴えをした様子。
TextENG: The abuse she claimed hadn't actually taken place—she had made a false report to distance herself from her adoptive father.

TextJPN: （以下は当時の担当者のえんぴつによる走り書き）
TextENG: (Below is a note written in pencil by the person on duty at the time)

TextJPN: むしろ娘の方に問題があったようだ。
TextENG: The problem appeared to be more with the daughter.

TextJPN: 女児の話はほとんどが作り話の可能性があると鹿骨市教育相談所の田中主査。
TextENG: Chief Investigator F of the city's education consultation office said that most of her stories of abuse were likely fabrications.

TextJPN: 今後は本児への指導を中心に行なうこととなった。
TextENG: They decided to shift the focus of their coaching to the child.

TextJPN: 本児の話は真に受けすぎないように注意。
TextENG: Be cautious not to take everything the child says as truth.
